entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 24 February 2023
